permissions: Requires authentication and broker membership for the broker referenced by the trucker referral code.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --code, --value, or --broker must be provided. Provided fields cannot be empty. Codes are normalized to uppercase with whitespace removed. code must be unique per broker (case-insensitive). value must be numeric and >= 0.

flags.name: --code
flags.validation: Cannot be empty when provided; normalized to uppercase with whitespace removed; must be unique per broker (case-insensitive).

flags.name: --value
flags.validation: Cannot be empty when provided; numeric value; must be >= 0.
